title: Lars Andersen: Blindfolded Archery. From spiritual Japanese history to modern extreme trick shooting

media:group.media:title: Lars Andersen: Blindfolded Archery. From spiritual Japanese history to modern extreme trick shooting
media:group.media:description:
Blindfolded archery is insanely difficult and requires a huge amount of training, for years back I would think it was impossible !
But with years of full-time archery then impossible things become possible.

Many historical archers did trick archery and there are quite a few descriptions of shots without looking.

Text and speak Antony Cummins
www.youtube.com/c/AntonyCummins

Mathias Fullerton who shoots compound bow in video and is No. 2 on the world ranking list, we are in the same archery club, Lyngby Bueskyttelaug and and even though it is very different archery we sometimes train together.
https://www.instagram.com/mathiasfullerton/


Are these just lucky shots?
All luck requires a lot of preparation and also here.
None of these shots I can do every time, but all the tricks in this video are tricks I have done several times.
Most of the video was filmed in a large sports hall and here is filmed 2 days to get good shots, that were also filmed well.

0:50 shoot and move, double shoot, is definitely the hardest trick,  I first practiced many times where I watched while I did.

Lars
